Aside from the big three (archmage, cleric, and mage), which character 
(s) would you like to have in any scenario and why?

My answer would be a thief, if I control him.  Walking around 
cloaked, anchoring a poison cloud, and then taunting your enemies into 
walking into the poison cloud is cool.

Archers, I'm just not sure about.  Use of the most powerfull attack 
(exploding bolt) is only usefull in wide open fields.

Soldiers - I used to be a fan of them.
